control.label: Nimbus is a light artwork centric skin that can be customized to suit various tastes.[CR][CR]After clicking OK on the button below, navigate to skin settings to set up main menu items/widgets and configure the skin to your likings. Every setting has a small help text at the bottom of the screen to help you understand how it works and what the setting does. You'll find other settings/config toggles in the View options panel in video windows.[CR][CR]Aside from setting the view type, there you can customize artwork style, clearlogo and artwork used. Please note that the views are auto locking so whenever you set a view it will be locked for the content type that you see in the View options panel.[CR][CR]Also, feel free to set different artwork/options for different content types (movies,tvshows) etc as Nimbus will remember your preferences for each content type in the video windows and home screen.[CR][CR]If you need to access this welcome screen again, you may do so in Skin settings Â» Extras.
